title: LoL launcher not opening
body:
hey, i don't know why but for some reason my launcher has decided to not open, i click on the logo to open it and nothing happens, i've waited for ages, and i have restarted my computer to try it again, but still.... nothing happens. i haven't played LoL in about 2ish weeks now, so idk if that has anything to do with it, but i would love a rely asap please!

quick edit: i have tried opening other games, and they open perfectly fine, so its just LoL.

replies.body: Is this on the updated or legacy client?  It may have crashed and lingering in the background, so a pc restart may help.  If it's still not opening then a security setting may have changed and blocking the client from launching.  I suggest using the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to rule out any security option possibilities.  Hope that helps!
this  is happening to me too, with the new client
